# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the GPU’s counter set instance.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The property typically matches one of the common counter set names that [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommonCounterSet] defines (see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/confirming-which-counters-and-counter-sets-a-gpu-supports]).
title: name
